name: Legend of Karnia: Lost between realities
name_original: Legend of Karnia: Lost between realities
description:
Inspired by Undertale and 2D Zelda games, Legend of Karnia: Lost between realities allows you to travel to a doomed and dark dimension. In this dimension, you'll encounter ghostly foes and shadowy and desperate people, and you'll stumble upon gravity-defying blachole, eating the land. Get the Black-Hole scepter, become the master of black holes and defeat the evil of this reality in this short and hardcore Zelda like.

More dimensions were planned, but never implemented, so be prepared for an "abrupt" ending.

Credits: The font used comes from "Zelda Breath of the wild", the sound effects come from this open source pack, and musics were made by Patrick de Arteaga as open source music, here's a link to his page
